CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. 17 reads: " Fashion Review - John Wesley AME Zion Church was the scene of the recent all-ages Fashion Review, directed by Mrs. Lena Davis. Prizes were given to those doing the best display in their classes.  Front row, left to right: Emma Lou Pryor, standing; seated, Mrs. Ira Patton, Mrs. Shelia Wright and Jo Linda Terry, and Rhonda Estes.  Second row: Mrs. Lena B. Davis, Olivet Yvonne, Mrs. Olivet Johnson, Beverly WIlliams, Sherwyn Mitchell, Velma Jean WIlliams, and the Rev. H.A.L. Clement, pastor.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women and girls holding flowers, including Emma Lou Pryor and Rhonda Estes in center, Vernita Golden Winston standing third from left, and Lena B. Davis, Sherwyn Mitchell, Velma Jean Williams, Shelia Wright, in front of room divider with two American flags and flower arrangements, and woman playing piano in background for Fashion Review at John Wesley AME Zion Church
